query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Poi fummo dentro al soglio de la porta 2 che ’l mal amor de l’anime disusa, 3 perché fa parer dritta la via torta,
query.error: **English:** 1 Then we were inside the threshold of the gate 2 that evil love of souls abuses, 3 because it makes the crooked way seem straight,
query.result: 1 Kemudian kami berada di dalam ambang pintu gerbang 2 yang disalahgunakan oleh cinta jahat terhadap jiwa-jiwa, 3 karena ia membuat jalan yang bengkok tampak lurus,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 sonando la senti’ esser richiusa; 5 e s’io avesse li occhi vòlti ad essa, 6 qual fora stata al fallo degna scusa?
query.error: **English:** 4 hearing it, I felt it was being closed; 5 and if I had turned my eyes to it, 6 what excuse would have been worthy for the fault?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Noi salavam per una pietra fessa, 8 che si moveva e d’una e d’altra parte, 9 sì come l’onda che fugge e s’appressa.
query.error: **English:** 7 We climbed up a cracked stone, 8 that moved on one side and the other, 9 like a wave that flees and approaches.
query.result: 7 Kami memanjat batu yang retak, 8 yang bergerak di satu sisi dan sisi lainnya, 9 seperti ombak yang menjauh dan mendekat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 «Qui si conviene usare un poco d’arte», 11 cominciò ’l duca mio, «in accostarsi 12 or quinci, or quindi al lato che si parte».
query.error: **English:** 10 "Here it is appropriate to use a little skill," 11 my guide began, "in approaching 12 now on this side, now on that, the side that departs."
query.result: 10 "Di sini kita harus menggunakan sedikit keterampilan," 11 pemanduku memulai, "dalam mendekati 12 sekarang di sisi ini, sekarang di sisi itu, sisi yang menjauh."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 E questo fece i nostri passi scarsi, 14 tanto che pria lo scemo de la luna 15 rigiunse al letto suo per ricorcarsi,
query.error: **English:** 13 And this made our steps slow, 14 so much that before the moon's wane 15 returned to its bed to rest again,
query.result: 13 Dan ini membuat langkah-langkah kami lambat, 14 sedemikian rupa sehingga sebelum bulan memudar 15 kembali ke tempat tidurnya untuk beristirahat lagi,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 che noi fossimo fuor di quella cruna; 17 ma quando fummo liberi e aperti 18 sù dove il monte in dietro si rauna,
query.error: **English:** 16 we were out of that narrow pass; 17 but when we were free and in the open, 18 up where the mountain draws together again,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 ïo stancato e amendue incerti 20 di nostra via, restammo in su un piano 21 solingo più che strade per diserti.
query.error: **English:** 19 I, weary, and both of us uncertain 20 of our way, stopped on a plain 21 more solitary than roads through deserts.
query.result: 19 aku lelah, dan kami berdua tidak yakin 20 akan jalan kami, berhenti di dataran 21 yang lebih sunyi daripada jalan-jalan melalui padang pasir.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Da la sua sponda, ove confina il vano, 23 al piè de l’alta ripa che pur sale, 24 misurrebbe in tre volte un corpo umano;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 e quanto l’occhio mio potea trar d’ale, 26 or dal sinistro e or dal destro fianco, 27 questa cornice mi parea cotale.
query.error: **English:** 25 and as far as my eye could stretch its wings, 26 now to the left and now to the right flank, 27 this ledge seemed to me to be like that.
query.result: 25 dan sejauh mata saya dapat melihat, 26 sekarang ke sisi kiri dan sekarang ke sisi kanan, 27 langkan ini tampak seperti itu bagi saya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 Là sù non eran mossi i piè nostri anco, 29 quand’ io conobbi quella ripa intorno 30 che dritto di salita aveva manco,
query.error: **English:** 28 There our feet had not yet moved, 29 when I recognized that bank all around, 30 which had a slope less steep to climb,
query.result: 28 Di sana kaki kami belum bergerak, 29 ketika aku mengenali tebing itu di sekeliling, 30 yang memiliki lereng yang tidak terlalu curam untuk didaki,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 esser di marmo candido e addorno 32 d’intagli sì, che non pur Policleto, 33 ma la natura lì avrebbe scorno.

query.result: 31 terbuat dari marmer putih dan dihiasi 32 dengan ukiran sedemikian rupa sehingga tidak hanya Polyclitus, 33 tetapi Alam sendiri akan merasa malu di sana.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 un’altra storia ne la roccia imposta; 53 per ch’io varcai Virgilio, e fe’mi presso, 54 acciò che fosse a li occhi miei disposta.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 Era intagliato lì nel marmo stesso 56 lo carro e ’ buoi, traendo l’arca santa, 57 per che si teme officio non commesso.
query.error: **English:** 55 There was carved in the very marble 56 the cart and the oxen, drawing the holy ark, 57 for which one fears an office not entrusted.
query.result: 55 Terukir di sana pada marmar itu sendiri 56 kereta dan lembu, menarik bahtera suci, 57 yang karenanya orang takut akan tugas yang tidak dipercayakan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Dinanzi parea gente; e tutta quanta, 59 partita in sette cori, a’ due mie’ sensi 60 faceva dir l’un ‘No’, l’altro ‘Sì, canta’.
query.error: **English:** 58 Before me appeared people; and all of them, 59 divided into seven choirs, to my two senses 60 made one say ‘No’, the other ‘Yes, sing’.
query.result: 58 Di hadapanku muncul orang-orang; dan semuanya, 59 terbagi menjadi tujuh paduan suara, kepada dua inderaku 60 membuat yang satu berkata ‘Tidak’, yang lain ‘Ya, nyanyi’.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Similemente al fummo de li ’ncensi 62 che v’era imaginato, li occhi e ’l naso 63 e al sì e al no discordi fensi.

query.result: 61 Sama seperti asap dupa 62 yang dibayangkan di sana, mata dan hidung 63 tidak setuju satu sama lain pada ya dan tidak.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 64 Di sana, mendahului bejana yang diberkati, 65 sang pemazmur yang rendah hati, menari, terangkat, 66 dan lebih dan kurang dari seorang raja dalam keadaan itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 I’ mossi i piè del loco dov’ io stava, 71 per avvisar da presso un’altra istoria, 72 che di dietro a Micòl mi biancheggiava.

query.result: 70 Aku menggerakkan kakiku dari tempat aku berdiri, 71 untuk mengamati dengan dekat kisah yang lain, 72 yang bersinar putih di belakang Michal.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 «Ecco di qua, ma fanno i passi radi», 101 mormorava il poeta, «molte genti: 102 questi ne ’nvïeranno a li alti gradi».
query.error: **English:** 100 “Behold, over here, but they make their steps rare,” 101 the poet was murmuring, “many people: 102 these will send us to the high ranks.”

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 Li occhi miei, ch’a mirare eran contenti 104 per veder novitadi ond’ e’ son vaghi, 105 volgendosi ver’ lui non furon lenti.
query.error: **English:** 103 My eyes, which were content to gaze 104 to see the new things for which they are eager, 105 turning towards him were not slow.
query.result: 103 Mataku, yang puas untuk memandang 104 untuk melihat hal-hal baru yang mereka inginkan, 105 berbalik ke arahnya tidaklah lambat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 Non vo’ però, lettor, che tu ti smaghi 107 di buon proponimento per udire 108 come Dio vuol che ’l debito si paghi.

query.result: 106 Tetapi aku tidak ingin, pembaca, agar kamu berkecil hati 107 dari niat baikmu untuk mendengar 108 bagaimana Tuhan ingin hutang itu dibayar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 Non attender la forma del martìre: 110 pensa la succession; pensa ch’al peggio 111 oltre la gran sentenza non può ire.
query.error: **English:** 109 Do not wait for the form of martyrdom: 110 think of the succession; think that for the worst 111 beyond the great judgment it cannot go.
query.result: 109 Jangan menunggu bentuk kesyahidan: 110 pikirkan suksesi; pikirkan bahwa untuk yang terburuk 111 di luar penghakiman besar itu tidak dapat terjadi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 Io cominciai: «Maestro, quel ch’io veggio 113 muovere a noi, non mi sembian persone, 114 e non so che, sì nel veder vaneggio».
query.error: **English:** 112 I began: "Master, that which I see 113 moving towards us, they do not seem to be people, 114 and I do not know what, I am so deluded in seeing them".
query.result: 112 Aku mulai berkata: "Guru, apa yang kulihat 113 bergerak ke arah kita, mereka tidak tampak seperti manusia, 114 dan aku tidak tahu apa, aku sangat tertipu dalam melihat mereka".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 115 Dan dia kepadaku: "Keadaan yang menyedihkan 116 dari siksaan mereka membuat mereka meringkuk di tanah, 117 sehingga mataku pada awalnya berdebat dengan mereka.

query.prompt:

118 Ma guarda fiso là, e disviticchia 119 col viso quel che vien sotto a quei sassi: 120 già scorger puoi come ciascun si picchia».

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 non v’accorgete voi che noi siam vermi 125 nati a formar l’angelica farfalla, 126 che vola a la giustizia sanza schermi?
query.error: **English:** 124 do you not realize that we are worms 125 born to form the angelic butterfly, 126 that flies to justice without barriers?
query.result: 124 tidakkah kamu menyadari bahwa kita adalah cacing 125 yang dilahirkan untuk membentuk kupu-kupu malaikat, 126 yang terbang menuju keadilan tanpa hambatan?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 Di che l’animo vostro in alto galla, 128 poi siete quasi antomata in difetto, 129 sì come vermo in cui formazion falla?
